- If you do not fill them, the system will use the â€œBeginner formulasâ€. If you fill them, the â€œAdvanced formulasâ€ are applied.

Recommended handlebar widthï¼š{value} cm Â± 2 cm

English.crank_result: Crank length referenceï¼š{value} mm (by gender & height).
English.crank_result_adv: Advanced formula crank lengthï¼š{value_adv} mm (by thigh/leg segments).
English.health_tip1: - If your hip or lower back is stiff, add +0.5 cm to recommended Stack to reduce stress.
English.health_tip2: - If limited neck mobility, reduce Reach by 10 mm or raise stem by 5 mm.
English.health_tip3: - If sternal notch height minus sit bone height is too large, keep handlebar drop under 60 cm to avoid low back strain.
English.health_tip4: - If you have injury history or pelvic tilt, consult a physical therapist before major adjustments.
